response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it holds an even greater significance for you, being worth $12,000 to you personally. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, while still allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its cost. I am confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency, productivity, or personal satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this valuable transaction for you.", "product_price": 9500}
